conversation.speaker: them
conversation.text: Sooo... it's Friday! How'd it go?

win.speaker: you
win.text: It went great! I'm totally part of the $scene crew now.

win.speaker: them
win.text: See? I knew you could do it! You've always been the coolest person I know.

weirdWin.speaker: you
weirdWin.text: I didn't make friends with the $scene folks.

weirdWin.speaker: them
weirdWin.text: Buncha stuckup jerkmotrons! Who needs em!

weirdWin.speaker: you
weirdWin.text: But, get this, I DID make friends with the $scene2s!

weirdWin.speaker: them
weirdWin.text: Hey, way to go! They seem more your style anyway.

weirdWin.speaker: you
weirdWin.text: Yeah, I wasn't sure at first, but I really like them!

weirdWin.speaker: them
weirdWin.text: I'm drinking a Moon Rock right now, in your honor.

lose.speaker: you
lose.text: ...not great tbh. I think everyone thinks I'm weird.

lose.speaker: them
lose.text: Hey, hang in there. The year is young, and friendships take time. I didn't like you for the first, like, six months.

lose.speaker: them
lose.text: Fr tho, just keep being yourself. They'll come around.

lose.speaker: you
lose.text: Wait, who said anything about being myself?? I've been being a $scene kid all week!

lose.speaker: them
lose.text: Haha, well, don't sweat it, ok? Your people are out there somewhere.

lose.speaker: you
lose.text: I'll try my best. Thanks, friend. :)
